Cuts
====

Cuts are ``bla bla bla`` available in :doc:`launch files <mg5_launch>`.

They are implemented in two steps:

1. cuts relevant *variables* are defined
2. cuts *code* is implemented

List of cuts
------------

``abscoscsmax``
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
